**Overview**
A Request for Proposal (RFP) solicitation has been issued by the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) for the supply and delivery of various quantities of household furniture for the Department of National Defence's Canadian Armed Forces (CAF) Trenton, ON.

**Scope**
The RFP aims to procure the replacement of end-of-life accommodation furniture at Canadian Forces Station (CFC) Alert, Nunavut, Canada. The requested commodities include wardrobes, lounge chairs, office chairs, love seats, and sofas.

**Background**
Canadian Forces Station Alert is an isolated station in the High Arctic, characterized by harsh winter conditions and limited comforts. The existing furniture has reached the end of its useful life, and this procurement aims to upgrade the accommodation facilities.
